name: industrial
summary: A Darkgrey with blue and green colorscheme.
description:
I took the colorscheme "jocafa" and edited the colors.

It has a darkgrey background with blue and green highlights.

Search highlights are yellow.

screenshot: http://img182.imageshack.us/img182/9925/gvimindustrial10pn6.png
install_details:
drop it in ~/.vim/colors/ or $VIM/vimfiles/colors/ depending on your OS.

:colorscheme industrial
